attributes.action: Educate teachers upon the value of childrens human rights as i feel they are neglected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i wish for this petition to be available so adults learn about human rights and that they do apply to children especially in school as human rights are often violated and if this persists i wish to contact the European Court of Human Rights and tell those the problem that the UK parliament is aware of i wish to speak to the Prime Minister and come up with an arrangement regarding this serious issue.
